title: April Enders is Here!
description: Collective updates in the end of April 2024. Enjoy our community news, releases, and open calls.
author: zortan

body.raw:
## Collective Updates

GM!   
April enders is here!  
Enjoy our community news, releases, and open calls, through this thread.   
Check our collective page on [@thehugxyz](https://x.com/thehugxyz) too.

NFT Indonesia Collective Page:  
[https://thehug.xyz/collectives/NFTindonesia_](https://thehug.xyz/collectives/NFTindonesia_)

### Arts DAO Fest

Great news coming from [@0xpolynesia_](https://x.com/0xpolynesia_) as his work has been chosen to be shown at Arts DAO Fest, 20-21 April 2024 in Dubai.

See more of 0xpolynesia's art and updates here:  
[https://thehug.xyz/artists/polynesia](https://thehug.xyz/artists/polynesia)

<Image
  src="/blogs/original/april-enders-is-here-0.jpeg"
  width="718"
  height="404"
  alt="Image"
  sizes="100vw"
/>

---

### @veryabd_

REI „Çå„ÅÑ by [@veryabd_](https://x.com/veryabd_).

"I am me, I am you, I am REI".

See more of Veryabd's art and update here:  
[https://thehug.xyz/artists/ver](https://thehug.xyz/artists/ver)
 
<Image
  src="/blogs/original/april-enders-is-here-1.jpeg"
  width="718"
  height="404"
  alt="Image"
  sizes="100vw"
/>

---

### @0xpolynesia_

LALUNA by [@0xpolynesia_](https://x.com/0xpolynesia_).

"Her soul is a realm of madness, where the abyss of despair meets the void of emptiness, a place where sanity fades into obscurity."

See more of 0xpolynesia's art and update here:  
[https://thehug.xyz/artists/polynesia](https://thehug.xyz/artists/polynesia)
 
<Image
  src="/blogs/original/april-enders-is-here-2.jpeg"
  width="718"
  height="404"
  alt="Image"
  sizes="100vw"
/>

---

### @naltanea

BRAOLO (i) by [@naltanea](https://x.com/naltanea).

Part of the Drawn By Hand Illustration Exhibition by Superchief Gallery.

See more of Nalta's art and update here:  
[https://thehug.xyz/artists/nalta](https://thehug.xyz/artists/nalta)

<Image
  src="/blogs/original/april-enders-is-here-3.jpeg"
  width="718"
  height="404"
  alt="Image"
  sizes="100vw"
/>

---

### @Mismar___

Ad Gloriam cum Sacrificio by [@Mismar___](https://x.com/Mismar___).

"ùîñùîûùî†ùîØùî¶ùî£ùî¶ùî†ùî¢ùî∞ ùî™ùî≤ùî∞ùî± ùîûùî´ùî° ùî∞ùî•ùî¨ùî≤ùî©ùî° ùîüùî¢ ùî™ùîûùî°ùî¢ ùî£ùî¨ùîØ ùî±ùî•ùî¢ ùî∞ùîûùî®ùî¢ ùî¨ùî£ ùî§ùîØùî¢ùîûùî±ùî¢ùîØ ùî§ùî©ùî¨ùîØùî∂."

See more of Mismar's art and update here:  
[https://thehug.xyz/artists/mismar](https://thehug.xyz/artists/mismar)

<Image
  src="/blogs/original/april-enders-is-here-4.jpeg"
  width="718"
  height="404"
  alt="Image"
  sizes="100vw"
/>

---

### @hadilocoboy

NEIGHBOURHOOD #4 by [@hadilocoboy](https://x.com/hadilocoboy).

"A house is a physical manifestation of the people who inhabit it, so it is not surprising that the house is a special place for many people..."

See more of Hadiloco's art and update here:  
[https://thehug.xyz/artists/hadilocoboy](https://thehug.xyz/artists/hadilocoboy)

<Image
  src="/blogs/original/april-enders-is-here-5.jpeg"
  width="718"
  height="404"
  alt="Image"
  sizes="100vw"
/>

---

### @BlotterNFT

MI-SELFIE by [@BlotterNFT](https://x.com/BlotterNFT). 

Based on Xcopy's "Last Selfie".

See more of Blotter's art and update here:  
[https://thehug.xyz/artists/Blotter](https://thehug.xyz/artists/Blotter)

<Image
  src="/blogs/original/april-enders-is-here-6.jpeg"
  width="718"
  height="404"
  alt="Image"
  sizes="100vw"
/>

---
